articles.description: With the CFL season fast approaching, we head across the league and examine each team. Today, TSN Football Insider Dave Naylor checks out the Edmonton Elks and their key pieces.
articles.content:
For a franchise that built its brand on successive championships, heres a shocking stat about the Edmonton CFL franchise now known as the Elks.
Theyve played in one Grey Cup game in the past 14 seas… [+3603 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Fan grabs Rory McIlroy's club out of bag at European Tour's Scottish Open - Golf Channel
articles.description: Rory McIlroy’s second round at the Scottish Open got off to a bizarre start when a spectator went into his bag.
articles.content:
Rory McIlroys second round at the Scottish Open got off to a bizarre start.
While waiting to tee off on the 10th hole, McIlroy and caddie Harry Diamond watched incredulously as a spectator walked on… [+1935 chars]

articles.title: Michael Andrew, an Olympic gold medal favorite, says he won't be vaccinated for Tokyo - Yahoo Canada Sports

articles.content:
